FuncDef: The display isis statistics updated-lsp command displays statistics about updated LSPs on the network. The display isis statistics updated-lsp command displays statistics about updated LSPs on the network.
CLIs: display isis <process-id> statisticsupdated-lsp [ history ] [ level-1 | level-2 | level-1-2 ]
display isis statistics updated-lsp [ history ] [ level-1 | level-2 | level-1-2 ] [ <process-id> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays statistics of recorded updated LSPs.
-

Displays statistics about an IS-IS Level-1 router.
-

Displays mesh-group information about a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
